fields.name: year
fields.title: Year
fields.description: The year over which the load factor has been calculated

fields.name: ngc_bmu_id
fields.title: NGC BMU ID
fields.description: The Balancing Mechanism Unit identifier used by the National Grid Company

fields.name: load_factor
fields.title: Load Factor
fields.description: The ratio between the average load over a given period relative to the maximum load

title: Load Factors
name: load-factors
description: This dataset contains load factors at a BMU granularity level for GB power plants. Please note that the load factor value for 2021 is incomplete and was based on data up to April of that year.
